name: League of Legends - Splashart
description:
LoRA trained on 50 League of Legends splasharts.

Trained with images at 768x512 (ideal size while using this LoRA).

I know there are a couple of other LoRAs about LoL splasharts, but I wanted to know if I could create one on my own that would generate good results.

I'm planning on adding the skin theme (Arcade, Dragonworld, etc) on future trainings.

meta.prompt:
league of legends, lol, splash art,
woman wearing a witch costume, haunted forest in the background, cauldron, bubbles, scary setting,
 <lora:LoL Splash V02:0.75>
meta.negativePrompt: (painting by bad-artist-anime:0.9), (painting by bad-artist:0.9), watermark, text, error, blurry, jpeg artifacts, cropped, worst quality, low quality, normal quality, jpeg artifacts, signature, watermark, username, artist name, (worst quality, low quality:1.4), bad anatomy
